snippet: Although how you use your human capital can have a major impact, few financial advisers measure it or discuss its impact on your prosperity.
abstract: Financial advisers seldom calculate important factor of human capital, an individual's varying ability to improve their fortune, during wealth and retirement planning.
lead_paragraph: Although how you use your human capital can have a major impact, few financial advisers measure it or discuss its impact on your prosperity.

headline.seo: Tapping Into Human Capital, an Important Asset
headline.main: The Biggest Financial Asset in Your Portfolio Is You
headline.print_headline: The Biggest Financial Asset in Your Portfolio Is You
